section: Your attempt to conjure an illusory dragon just produces a soft bang and a bad smell. Cackling with glee at your ineptitude, the witches cast an extraordinary hex on you. You now find that you are compelled to travel to the Haunted Hills without delay. You cannot stop at any towns or inns on the way. Once you reach the Haunted Hills, the compulsion will leave you and you can act normally. [I can't enforce this. Be as honest as you like --Ed] Now .
